newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Asian dollar deposits market closed for Vesak Day.
newsitem.headline: Asian dollar deposits market closed for Vesak Day.

text.p: The Asian dollar deposit market is closed today for the Vesak Day holiday.
It will reopen on Thursday, May 22.
On Tuesday, in day-to-day rates, Tuesday/Wednesday, Wednesday/Thursday and week-fixed were unchanged from Monday's common 5-11/16 5-9/16 percent, respectively.
Among longer dates, two-months rose 1/16 percentage point to 5-13/16 5-11/16 percent and four-months rose 1/16 point to 5-7/8 5-3/4 percent.
Six-months was unchanged from Monday's 6 5-7/8 percent and twelve-months unchanged at 6-1/4 6-1/8 percent.
